OCC: Najah hadn't freed her, should we forget all or continued it?


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> OOC I thought Najah still had Lady Hawk wrapped up so she couldn't 
> walk.
> 
> OK if she can then
> 
> Lady Hawk walks along covered by repressor, she hoped that she'd 
get 
> the chance to escape but not before she took care of Squizzy. As 
long 
> as the snake eating rat had the skill to continue the experiments 
she 
> couldn't be allowed to exist.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Repressor::
> > 
> > Repressor growls, listening to the femm complain. "Look, I don't 
> know 
> > how you came into the Alliance, or what your motives are, but my 
> > orders are to get you back to base."
> > 
> > He decides to be a bit nicer, "Now please walk or I'm going to 
have 
> > to scrapp you and take you to base that way."
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Lady Hawk used the logic from the information she'd given the 
> > alliance. "And
> > > if I flew away just Where would I go? I came to this part of 
the 
> > world to
> > > find somewhere to do my work. You think I'd leave and give up 
my 
> > life?" She
> > > was referring to the experiments but she knew she meant her 
spark 
> > as well.
> > > "I'm a hawk remember? I'm sure your alliance has plenty of bots 
> > that could
> > > out fly me." She wasn't sure about the last statement but knew 
> she 
> > couldn't
> > > maintain full speed long enough to find out. She took advantage 
> of 
> > the
> > > situation and pricked Najah with the needle to extract some DNA 
> > from the
> > > snake. "And you, the harder you squeeze the harder it'll be 
when 
> I 
> > make you
> > > obselete." she was steemed that this bot wasn't letting up 
after 
> > Zardus
> > > ordered her safety.
